channel.description:

item.title: Adventure Quest reference to World of Warcraft
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:12, topic:253627”][quote author=the fu superior link=topic=335047.msg2612895#msg2612895 date=1230855272]

No, WoW is completely tactic-less. Therefore WoW sucks at him.

Tacticl-less? Trust me, you will get killed constantly in WoW, you’ve obviously never played it before. Tell me a game you play, that requires tactics?
[/quote]So what if you die? There’s nothing to lose, hence it’s boring. By saying i suck at it you’re correct cause i don’t play it. I wouldn’t want to play a carebear game where you goal is to grind 24/7 anyway.[/quote]
When I said you, I didn’t mean people in general, i meant him specifically for thinking its easy.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:6, topic:253627”][quote author=Zach1188 link=topic=335047.msg2611946#msg2611946 date=1230801992]
No, WoW is completely tactic-less. Therefore WoW sucks at him.
[/quote]
Tacticl-less? Trust me, you will get killed constantly in WoW, you’ve obviously never played it before. Tell me a game you play, that requires tactics?[/quote]So what if you die? There’s nothing to lose, hence it’s boring. By saying i suck at it you’re correct cause i don’t play it. I wouldn’t want to play a carebear game where you goal is to grind 24/7 anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Adventure Quest reference to World of Warcraft
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

[quote=“Frostie21, post:10, topic:253627”][quote author=Zach1188 link=topic=335047.msg2613311#msg2613311 date=1230877713]

No, WoW is completely tactic-less. Therefore WoW sucks at him.

Tacticl-less? Trust me, you will get killed constantly in WoW, you’ve obviously never played it before. Tell me a game you play, that requires tactics?

Guildwars requires far more tactics, PvP-wise anyway.
[/quote]

Guildwars is easy mode.I play WoW atm,but might try gw later,it just got boring because everything became a farm fest.[/quote]
Then you don’t know GW well. Early on, you can compare it to a “farm fest”. But once reaching level 20, which can be done in a day or two, the whole point of the game shifts from training/farming etc. to team tactics, PvP tactics, “running” (need to know GW) tactics, and everything else tactics. It is a highly “team” game, and quickly becomes skill and intellect based rather than time investment based.

Read full topic
item.source: Adventure Quest reference to World of Warcraft

Tacticl-less? Trust me, you will get killed constantly in WoW, you’ve obviously never played it before. Tell me a game you play, that requires tactics?
[/quote]
Guildwars requires far more tactics, PvP-wise anyway.[/quote]

Guildwars is easy mode.I play WoW atm,but might try gw later,it just got boring because everything became a farm fest.
